credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: Plaque
provenance:
Jordan - Volpe Gallery, New York
Marcia and William Goodman
description: White clay body, cast.  Rectangular plaque set into wooden frame.  Underglaze decorated with scene of a lake and clusters of tall slender trees, low hills in background.  Predominantly blues and greens, with cream colors in sky and water.  Artist's monogram in lower right corner.  Vellum glaze on front, partially on sides; cracklature.  Back not glazed.
name: Plaque
